lg.l: A Set of Phrases, learnt by Rote:
A Passion for a Scarlet Coat:
When at a Play to Laugh or Cry,
You cannot tell ye: Reason why:
Never to hold her Tongue a minute
While all she prates has Nothing in it.
Whole Hours can with a Coxcomb sit,
And takes his Nonsense all for Wit:
Her Learning mounts to read a Song,
But, half ye: Words pronouncing wrong;
Has ev'ry Repartee in Store,
She spoke ten Thousand Times before,
Can ready Compliments Supply,
On all Occations cut & dry,
Such hatred to a Parsons Gown
The sight will put her in swoon,
For Conversation well endu'd,
She calls it Witty to be rude;
And placing Raillery in Railing
Will tell aloud your greatest failing
Nor make a Scruple to expose
Your bandy Leg, or Crooked Nose
Can at her drinking Tea, run o're
The Scandal of yẹ day before.
Emproving hourly in her skill
Of Cheat and wrangle at Quadrille.In chusing Lace, a Critic nice,
Knows to a Groat yẹ lowest Price.
Can in her Female Clubs dispute
What Lineing best ye: Silk will sute.
What Colours each Complexion Match:
And where with Art to place a Patch.
Jf chance a Mouse Creeps in her Sight
Can finely Counterfeit a Fright,
So sweetly screams, if it comes near her
She ravishes all Hearts to hear her:
Can dex'rously her Husband teize
By takeing Fit's when e'er she please:
By frequent practice learns yẹ Trick,
At proper Seasons to be Sick:
Thinks nothing gives one Airs so pretty
At once Creating Love, and Pitty.
Jf Molly happens to be careless,
And but Neglect to warm her Hair Lace
She gets a Cold as sure as Death,
And vows she scarce can fetch her Breath.
Admires how Modest Women can
Be so Robostious like a man.Jn Party furious to her Power:
A bitter Whig, or Tory sow'r:
Her Arguments directly tend
Against ye: Side she would defend:
Will prove her self a Tory plain
From Principles ye: Whigs maintain,
And to defend ye: Whigish Cause,
Her Topicks from ye: Torys draws.
O Yes! If any Man can find
More Virtues in a Womans Mind,
Let them be sent to 1a Printer Mrs.Harding,
She'll pay ye: charges to a Farthing:
Take Notice she has my Commission
To add them in yẹ next Edition:
They may out·sell a better thing,
So Holla Boys, God save the King:415-570Y
